question: Which Indian athlete won the GV Raja Sports award of Kerala Government, in the male category?
explanation:
Indian sprinter and national record holder in 400 metres sprint, Muhammad Anas was presented with the GV Raja award (Male) for athletics, instituted by Kerala State Sports Council.
Anas was presented the award for winning the silver medal for India in the 400-metre race at the Asian Games held in Jakarta, Indonesia. He had also won Gold in the 2017 Asian Athletics Championships. In the female category, PC Thulasi was selected as the recipient of GV Raja award. Thulasi is an Indian badminton player from Palakkad district, who was the national champion in 2016.
